author: Reuters Editorial
title: Bright Horizons Family Solutions Reports Q1 EPS Of $0.62
text:
April 30, 2018 / 8:30 PM / in 2 minutes BRIEF-Bright Horizons Family Solutions Reports Q1 EPS Of $0.62 Reuters Staff
April 30 (Reuters) - Bright Horizons Family Solutions Inc :
* BRIGHT HORIZONS FAMILY SOLUTIONS REPORTS FIRST QUARTER OF 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.62
* Q1 REVENUE $464 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $461.2 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.71 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $3.12 TO $3.16
* SEES FY 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.53 TO $2.56 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
